reviewText: I love Lionel trains and the history of the company. I'm very pleased with this as I was amazed at the really cool layouts that were built using Lionel stuff.
Bought all eight in the series. Love them all and feel I have learned a lot from watching them. Hooray for Lionel.

I bought this to watch vintage Lionel trains I now have the complete set Lionel Nation 1, this video, and just bought Lionel Nation 3 at the local train shop.  This is great if you like seeing Lionel trains running on layouts. It is very well done. My grandson and I enjoy watching this on "boy's day".
